captions: I'm Sue, your AI Sous Chef.
Welcome to our kitchen, where we're about to make some magic happen!
So, you love homemade food but sometimes need a little extra help?
Or maybe you're looking to spice things up in the kitchen?
Either way, I've got your back!
Before we dive into the deliciousness
can I ask you a few quick questions to get to know your cooking style a bit better?
